meanings.definition: A distinct part or portion of something.
meanings.sent1: The first section of the book introduced the main character.
meanings.sent2: She cut the cake into sections to share with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The section of the playground with the swings was always the busiest.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a puzzle, each thought a separate section waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The section of the forest with the tallest trees was truly majestic.

meanings.definition: A division or segment of a larger entity.
meanings.sent1: The math test had a challenging section on geometry.
meanings.sent2: The hotel has a special section for guests who prefer a quieter environment.
meanings.sent3: The section of the store with the toys was like a wonderland for children.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a broken section of a once complete puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The section of the painting with the bright colors stood out the most.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things within a larger whole.
meanings.sent1: The science section of the library is where you can find books on space.
meanings.sent2: The student council is a section of the school dedicated to student leadership.
meanings.sent3: The section of the garden with the sunflowers always attracts bees.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was a tight-knit section of the larger friend group.
meanings.sent5: The section of the choir with the sopranos sang beautifully.
